verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year אַחַ֗ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, In the first לְדָרְיָ֛וֶשׁ <WH1867> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחַשְׁוֵר֖וֹשׁ <WH325> a-chash-ve-Roosh of Ahasuerus מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> miz-Ze-ra' of the seed מָדָ֑י <WH4074> ma-Dai; of the Medes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הָמְלַ֔ךְ <WH4427> ha-me-Lach, which was made king עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al over מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> mal-Chut over the realm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> kas-Dim. of the Chaldeans

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year אַחַת֙ <WH259> 'a-Chat In the first לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> le-ma-le-Cho, of his reign אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel, I Daniel בִּינֹ֖תִי <WH995> bi-No-ti understood בַּסְּפָרִ֑ים <WH5612> bas-se-fa-Rim; by books מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> mis-Par the number הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> hash-sha-Nim, of the years אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-Yah was דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- whereof the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמִיָ֣ה <WH3414> yir-mi-Yah came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi, the prophet לְמַלֹּ֛אות <WH4390> le-mal-Lot that he would accomplish לְחָרְב֥וֹת <WH2723> le-cha-re-Vot in the desolations יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> va-'et-te-Nah And I set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנַ֗י <WH6440> pa-Nai, my face אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai unto the Lord הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> le-vak-Kesh to seek תְּפִלָּ֖ה <WH8605> te-fil-Lah by prayer וְתַחֲנוּנִ֑ים <WH8469> ve-ta-cha-nu-Nim; and supplications בְּצ֖וֹם <WH6685> be-Tzom with fasting וְשַׂ֥ק <WH8242> ve-Sak and sackcloth וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> va-'E-fer. and ashes

וָֽאֶתְפַּֽלְלָ֛ה <WH6419> va-'et-pal-Lah And I prayed לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai my God וָאֶתְוַדֶּ֑ה <WH3034> va-'et-vad-Deh; and made my confession וָאֹֽמְרָ֗ה <WH559> va-'o-me-Rah, and said אָנָּ֤א <WH577> 'an-Na O אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord הָאֵ֤ל <WH410> ha-'El God הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> hag-ga-dOl the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֔א <WH3372> ve-han-no-Ra, and dreadful שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> sho-Mer keeping הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> hab-be-Rit the covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> ve-ha-Che-sed, and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <WH157> le-'o-ha-Vav to them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> u-le-sho-me-Rei him and to them that keep מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tav. his commandments

חָטָ֥אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned וְעָוִ֖ינוּ <WH5753> ve-'a-Vi-nu and have committed iniquity; וְהִרְשַׁעְנוּ ve-hir-sha'-nu כהִרְשַׁ֣עְנוּ <WH7561> hir-Sha'-nu condemn קוּמָרָ֑דְנוּ <WH4775> u-ma-Ra-de-nu; and have rebelled וְס֥וֹר <WH5493> ve-Sor even by departing מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖ךָ <WH4687> mi-mitz-vo-Te-cha from thy precepts וּמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4941> u-mi-mish-pa-Tei-cha. and from thy judgments

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-nu Neither have we hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dei-cha unto thy servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who דִּבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> dib-be-Ru which spake בְּשִׁמְךָ֔ <WH8034> be-shim-Cha, in thy name אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <WH4428> me-la-Chei-nu to our kings שָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <WH8269> sa-Rei-nu our princes וַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> va-'a-vo-Tei-nu; and our fathers וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> ve-'El and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am and to all the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the land

לְךָ֤ le-Cha אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai O Lord הַצְּדָקָ֔ה <WH6666> hatz-tze-da-Kah, righteousness וְלָ֛נוּ ve-La-nu בֹּ֥שֶׁת <WH1322> Bo-shet [belongeth] unto thee but unto us confusion הַפָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> hap-pa-Nim of faces כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; is this לְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish to the men יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּלְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> u-le-yo-she-Vei and to the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and unto all Israel הַקְּרֹבִ֣ים <WH7138> hak-ke-ro-Vim [that are] near וְהָרְחֹקִ֗ים <WH7350> ve-ha-re-cho-Kim, and [that are] far off בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> ha-'a-ra-tzOt through all the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to which הִדַּחְתָּ֣ם <WH5080> hid-dach-Tam whither thou hast driven שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, because בְּמַעֲלָ֖ם <WH4604> be-ma-'a-Lam them because of their trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מָֽעֲלוּ־ <WH4603> ma-'a-lu- that they have trespassed בָֽךְ׃ <WH99999> Vach.

יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Lord לָ֚נוּ La-nu בֹּ֣שֶׁת <WH1322> Bo-shet to us [belongeth] confusion הַפָּנִ֔ים <WH6440> hap-pa-Nim, of face לִמְלָכֵ֥ינוּ <WH4428> lim-la-Chei-nu to our kings לְשָׂרֵ֖ינוּ <WH8269> le-sa-Rei-nu to our princes וְלַאֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> ve-la-'a-vo-Tei-nu; and to our fathers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher because חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu because we have sinned לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> la-do-Nai To the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God הָרַחֲמִ֖ים <WH7356> ha-ra-cha-Mim [belong] mercies וְהַסְּלִח֑וֹת <WH5547> ve-has-se-li-Chot; and forgivenesses כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for מָרַ֖דְנוּ <WH4775> ma-Rad-nu though we have rebelled בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor שָׁמַ֔עְנוּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-nu, Neither have we obeyed בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> la-Le-chet to walk בְּתֽוֹרֹתָיו֙ <WH8451> be-to-ro-Tav in his laws אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan which he set לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-nu, before בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> be-Yad us by עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im. the prophets

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Yea all Israel עָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru have transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תּ֣וֹרָתֶ֔ךָ <WH8451> to-ra-Te-cha, thy law וְס֕וֹר <WH5493> ve-Sor even by departing לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> she-Mo-a' that they might not obey בְּקֹלֶ֑ךָ <WH6963> be-ko-Le-cha; thy voice וַתִּתַּ֨ךְ <WH5413> vat-tit-Tach is poured עָלֵ֜ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu so הָאָלָ֣ה <WH423> ha-'a-Lah therefore the curse וְהַשְּׁבֻעָ֗ה <WH7621> ve-hash-she-vu-'Ah, upon us and the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כְּתוּבָה֙ <WH3789> ke-tu-Vah that [is] written בְּתוֹרַת֙ <WH8451> be-to-Rat in the law מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu because we have sinned לֽוֹ׃ <WH99999> lo.

וַיָּ֜קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem And he hath confirmed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ; דְּבָרָיו de-va-rav כדְּבָרֹ֣ו <WH1697> de-va-Ro act קאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber which he spake עָלֵ֗ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, against וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and against שֹֽׁפְטֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH8199> sho-fe-Tei-nu against us and against our judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who שְׁפָט֔וּנוּ <WH8199> she-fa-Tu-nu, that judged לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> le-ha-Vi us by bringing עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu and against רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah evil גְדֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah; upon us a great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- has not נֶעֶשְׂתָ֗ה <WH6213> ne-'es-Tah, hath not been done תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, for under the whole heaven כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who נֶעֶשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> ne-'es-Tah as hath been done בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. upon Jerusalem

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher it כָּתוּב֙ <WH3789> ka-Tuv As [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, of Moses אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah all this evil הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise בָּ֣אָה <WH935> Ba-'ah is come עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; and וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- have not חִלִּ֜ינוּ <WH2470> chil-Li-nu upon us yet made we not our prayer אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for פְּנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God לָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> la-Shuv that we might turn מֵֽעֲוֹנֵ֔נוּ <WH5771> me-'a-vo-Ne-nu, from our iniquities וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> u-le-has-Kil and understand בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> ba-'a-mit-Te-cha. thy truth

וַיִּשְׁקֹ֤ד <WH8245> vai-yish-Kod watched יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Therefore hath the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- respect הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah, upon the evil וַיְבִיאֶ֖הָ <WH935> vay-vi-'E-ha and brought עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; respect כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for צַדִּ֞יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik [is] righteous יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh it upon us for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- respect כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to all מַֽעֲשָׂיו֙ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sav in all his works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, which he doeth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-nu for we obeyed בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> be-ko-Lo. not his voice

וְעַתָּ֣ה׀ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai And now O Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher who הוֹצֵ֨אתָ <WH3318> ho-Tze-ta forth אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמְּךָ֜ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha thy people מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> cha-za-Kah, with a mighty וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> vat-ta-'as- and hast gotten לְךָ֥ le-Cha שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> shem thee renown כַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; is this חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu we have sinned רָשָֽׁעְנוּ׃ <WH7561> ra-Sha-'e-nu. we have done wickedly
